column5: Vaccinated Americans can travel to Canada august 9th. Download Arrive can app, be fully vaccinated, proof of vaccine, negative test before travel. Subject to random test at border.
And folks that dont have a smart phone ? Alot of old farts still carry a flipper ?
I'm a flipper chow,but don't wry you won't get denied cause of your phone.

From the above link... "Subject to limited exceptions, all travellers must use ArriveCAN (app or web portal) to submit their travel information. If they are eligible to enter Canada and meet specific criteria, fully vaccinated travellers will not have to quarantine upon arrival in Canada." You can log in on your computer to submit your travel information too.

How soon are you able to sign up on line and register on the Arrivecan site for those that don't have a smart phone with the app? Just curious if it can be done now or if there is a certain time frame.

just tried to fill out the ArriveCAN site: - it says your arrival date must be between 7/18 and 7/22 - WTF? - then i got an error message: Error 1: Your arrival date and time is greater than 72 hours. WTF?? how can a date and time be greater than 72 hours?? i gave up assuming there's lots of bugs to fix phish
You can register but you cannot complete the application until it is less than 72 hours before your arrival.That is not a bug (not worded the best, but that is what it means).Frank
